text: Binɨb kɨlop mɨŋel apek, kɨles tɨmel gɨl jak mɨdɨl mɨŋel okok del amub ak, mɨñmɨñ gɨnɨgel tek lup. Kɨli God nop chɨg tep gel nɨgek nop tep gup ak nɨm, tap teplep yɨbɨl kɨlop ñɨnɨgab. Tap teplep anɨb ak anɨgɨl mɨdeb, kɨli pel pelnep yenɨgabal. Pen binɨb anɨb okok nop mapen lɨpal okok, kɨlop gɨnɨgayn agak tek gɨnɨgab. Anɨb ak tek kɨli mɨñmɨñ gɨnɨgel tek lup.
